lead_paragraph: An article on Thursday about changes in American military strategy as the war in Afghanistan develops misspelled the given name of a scholar who spoke about the poor chances of forming anti-Taliban resistance in southern Afghanistan. She is Rosanne Klass, not Roseanne.
abstract: Correction of Nov 8 article on shifts in American military strategy in Afghanistan, which misspelled name of scholar Rosanne Klass
